Key Match Events: Brant Hurter of the Detroit Tigers pitched 5.0 innings, allowing 6 hits and 1 earned run while striking out 5 batters.
Riley Greene of the Detroit Tigers hit a home run, his 20th of the season, and contributed 2 RBIs.
Romy González of the Boston Red Sox went 2-3 and scored a run.
Rich Hill of the Boston Red Sox pitched 0.2 innings, allowing 1 hit and 2 earned runs while striking out 2 batters.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Red Sox outhit the Tigers 6-3 but still lost the game.
The Tigers won the game with a final score of 4-1 at Comerica Park, Detroit, MI.
